DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate program effectiveness home fortification along infant young child feeding ( IYCF ) counsel strategy address anemia complementary feeding gap program setting Integrated Family Health Initiative implement CARE India ( non-profit organization ) partnership Government Bihar . The study also seek assess field level worker experience counsel dissemination home fortification product .
DOC.brief_title: Home Fortification Complementary Foods Bihar India
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate program effectiveness home fortification along infant young child feeding ( IYCF ) counsel strategy address anemia complementary feeding gap program setting Integrated Family Health Initiative implement CARE India ( non-profit organization ) partnership Government Bihar.The key objective study examine acceptability utilization target population , assess impact infant young child feeding ( IYCF ) practice , evaluate impact child growth , evaluate impact hemoglobin concentration , assess front line worker experience motivation disseminate enhance counsel home fortification product .
DOC.criteria: Randomly select child live within HealthSub Centers ( HSC ) West Champaran Bihar Children less six month age Children great eighteen month age
